data.name: Ghostrunner - Digital Artbook
data.detailed_description:
Ghostrunner is a hardcore FPP game packed with lightning-fast action, set in a grim, cyberpunk megastructure. Climb Dharma Tower, humanity’s last shelter, after a world-ending cataclysm. Make your way up from the bottom to the top, confront the tyrannical Keymaster, and take your revenge.

Immerse yourself in Ghostrunner with the artbook. The following items are included in the artbook.

Artbook:
-21 pages of Ghostrunner Artwork

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K (4 * 3300) AMD Phenom II X4 965 (4 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2048 MB) / Radeon RX 550 (4096 MB)
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K (4 * 4000) or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X (4 * 3500) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (4096 MB) or Radeon RX 5700 (8192 MB)
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
